pp-value-6.value: the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg,France and Spain

pp-value-8.value: With 1,015 clubs and more than 2,200,000 members as at 31 December 2021,Basic-Fit is the largest fitness chain in Europe. Basic-Fit aims to provideaffordable, innovative and high-quality fitness that is available to everyone,anytime, anywhere and in their own way.
